attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned want the communities of the Spen Valley to remain united together in a single Parliamentary constituency.

As well as for reasons of strong community identity, the name Spen has appeared in Parliament since 1885 and should not be lost.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Boundary Commission for England which is independant of central Government. The Commission has launched a consultation into its latest boundary review and comments from the public are welcome.
